title: Khmer Rouge Sayings of Angkar Q3

content.question: The ideas expressed in the last two slogans most likely reflect which of the following twentieth-century developments?

choices.label: Constitutional conflicts emerging between the executive and judicial branches in communist states
Civil rights movements destabilizing newly independent states
Totalitarian states using violence and genocide against civilians to maintain power
Civil war between communist factions supporting China and the Soviet Union

content.answer: Totalitarian states using violence and genocide against civilians to maintain power
